creator: GoApp (Netherlands) B.V.
descriptionHtml:
GoApp is the #1 solution for all your pet needs. Hire high-quality dog walking and pet sitting services, and buy pet products near you with same-day delivery!

DOG WALKING & PET SITTING
Peace of mind
As pet owners ourselves, we handpick our walkers and sitters - there's no automated process. We make sure to go through all applications, and we follow all walkers and sitters in each and every step of the way. We would never hire people with whom we wouldn't trust our pets. Our pets are our babies and this is what drives GoApp!

Also, you can:
- Add notes and instructions about your pet
- Track dog walks in real-time
- Exchange instant messages with dog walkers and pet sitters
- Get reports with pictures after every walk or sitting experience
- Review your walkers and sitters (your feedback means everything to us!)
- Securely pay through the app

All services provided through our platform are covered by insurance and are provided with 24/7 customer support.

For pet sitters and dog walkers
Your opinion matters to us! Join the ONLY platform in which dog walkers and pet sitters can review pets and their owners. Our goal is to provide dog walkers and pet sitters with all the tools needed to ensure a safe, fun and trustworthy experience to pets, users and you!

Make money doing what you love. Walkers and sitters can:
- Exchange messages and send photos to pet owners
- Get paid securely through GoApp
- Enable push notifications to respond faster to booking requests
- Rate pets and the experience
- Count with our 24/7 customer support (for REAL!)

***Our dog walking services will be available in the Netherlands in June 2019. Our pet sitting services are #ComingSoon!

PET PRODUCTS
GoApp is changing the way pet owners shop for pet products. GoApp's product marketplace is location-based, allowing you to:
- Find the best deals of pet products available near you
- Get products conveniently delivered to your doorstep on the SAME DAY!
- Shop products tailored to your particular pet needs
- Securely pay through the app

Here are some of the products you find at GoApp:
- Dog food
- Cat food
- Dry food
- Wet food
- Cat litter
- Pee pads
- Leashes and collars
- Anti-flea
- Vermifuge
- Meds
- Toys, and much more!

***Our product marketplace is currently available only in Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo, Brazil. We will be launching in Europe very soon!

Other features (available worldwide)
#PetCalendar All services and products bought through our platform are automatically uploaded to your pet calendar, allowing you to plan ahead for next purchases. You can also set reminders such as vet appointments, meds, and vaccines. GoApp is here to make pets happier and owners'​ lives easier :-)

#Community Connect with other pet lovers and look for animals available for adoption. We are very passionate about the animal cause and want to help every animal out there to find a happy home <3 Here are some of the dog and cat breeds you can find at GoApp:
- Mixed breed
- Labrador
- Bulldog
- French bulldog
- Pomeranian
- Siberian husky
- Pug
- Beagle
- Poodle
- Yorkshire
- Golden retriever
- Border collie
- Shih Tzu, and much more!

Join the #PetRevolution and download now!
descriptionShort: Find dog walkers and pet sitters and buy pet products with same-day delivery
